|rad1chip2 = Lantiq;PSB 8304;XWAY™ WAVE300 (PSB 8304 V1.1); |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "P/N: 141751920003J R01" is silkscreened on the board in the images provided here. :The default SSID appears to be '''ARV7519XXXXXX''' where '''XXXXXX''' is the last three octets of the wireless interface MAC address. {{seealso|Orange Livebox 2.1}} ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.pcwintech.com/screenshots-arcadyan-arv7519-arcadyan-firmware Router screenshots on PcWinTech] *[http://www.redeszone.net/routers/nuevo-router-multimedia-livebox-analisis-del-nuevo-router-de-orange-con-wi-fi-n-a-300mbps/ Review ''Orange Livebox'' on '''RedesZone'''] (SP) *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=39074 ''Arcadyan ARV7519'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/arcadyan/vgv7519 ''Astoria VGV7519'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ==Notes== 
The router is called Livebox 2.1 and manufactured by Astoria. 
Model: ARV7519RW22-A-LT.
Hardware:
- CPU: PSB 80920 (VRX288)
- Flash: MXIC MX29Gl256ELT2I 32 MB
- RAM: Etrontech EM68C16CWVB (64Mx16 DDR2) up to 400MHz
- ADSL/VDSL: Lantiq PSB 80208V VR9
- Wireless: Lantiq PSB 8231 + PSB 8304 (maybe XWAY 300)
- VoIP: Lantiq PEF 42068
- Gigabit switch: Lantiq PEF 7071V (four 10/100 ports
  integrated in SoC and one 10/100/1000 throught RGMII)
The firmware i guess is based in VxWorks and BRN-Boot as bootloader

Architecture:	MIPS 34Kc
Vendor:		Lantiq
Bootloader:	BRNBoot
System-On-Chip:	VRX288 V1.1 (PSB 80920 EL)
CPU/Speed	500MHz
Flash-Chip:	EN29LV640AB-90TIP
Flash size:	16 MB (2x 8 MB)
RAM:		64 MB (EM68B16CWQD-25H)
WAN:		1x RJ45
Modem:		Infineon/Lantiq XWAY VRX208
Wireless:	Ralink RT5362F (TPHR059609, 1222STA1) 2.4GHz 802.11bgn
Ethernet:	3x Lantiq PEF 7071V, internal configurable (Infineon)
Internet:	ADSL2+
Phone:		Lantiq XWAY SLIC120 (PEF 42068 V V1.2), 3x FXS 
                (TAE ports which provide POTS via a SIP gateway)
USB:		Yes 2x USB 2.0
Serial:		Yes
JTAG:		Yes (EJTAG 14p)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
